name: Impel Down
text: [Activate: Main] You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Stage: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Impel Down} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand and rest this Stage: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Impel Down} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
